name: Bug Splatter
description:
My 3D FPS project for the Coursera Game Design and Development course.

Significant Modifications:

  • Created complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels
  • Added multiple additional levels with logical story progression
  • Added interlude scenes in-between missions to give the player a sense of a story

Note:

The middle of the main pistol is a little buggy, but the assets were provided by MSU. I did my best to make it look as acceptable as possible. The rest of the assets are very well made.
